name: St. Francis of Assisi
summary: Francis of Assisi was an Italian friar who founded the Franciscan Order. He is known for his devotion to poverty, his love of nature, and his stigmata. He received the stigmata in 1224, becoming the first person in Christian history to bear the wounds of Christ. He is the patron saint of Italy, animals, and the environment. His Canticle of the Sun is one of the first works of Italian literature.
keyQuotes: Lord, make me an instrument of your peace.
